articles.title: Implementing Transformer-Based Motion Anonymization
articles.excerpt: A hands-on guide to adapting transformer architectures for privacy-preserving skeleton data.
articles.content: In this post, I walk through how to modify transformer models to anonymize skeleton-based motion data without sacrificing action recognition accuracy. Weâ€™ll cover data preprocessing, model architecture tweaks, training strategies, and evaluation metrics, with code snippets in PyTorch.
articles.author: Thomas Carr

articles.title: Building HIPAA-Compliant AI Platforms on AWS
articles.excerpt: Lessons learned from architecting a cloud-native intraoperative neurophysiological monitoring platform.
articles.content: Drawing from my experience at ACR Technologies, I outline best practices for designing and deploying HIPAA-compliant AI systems on AWS. Topics include data encryption, audit logging, disaster-recovery setups, and CI/CD automation with AWS Amplify and Elastic Beanstalk.
articles.author: Thomas Carr

articles.title: Best Practices for Responsible AI Research
articles.excerpt: Guidelines for ensuring fairness and ethical considerations in AI experiments.
articles.content: Ethical AI goes beyond biased datasets. In this article, I cover processes like stakeholder engagement, fairness metrics selection, reproducible experiment tracking with MLflow, and compliance with FedRAMP and SOC 2 standards.
articles.author: Thomas Carr

articles.title: Scaling React Apps with MUI and TypeScript
articles.excerpt: Strategies for maintainable and performant front-end development in enterprise projects.
articles.content: Based on my work at ViBot and MDcentric, I share architectural patterns, state-management choices, and performance optimizations for large-scale React apps using Material-UI and TypeScript.
articles.author: Thomas Carr

articles.title: Optimizing Slurm Workflows for ML Training
articles.excerpt: Tips for efficient job scheduling on HPC clusters with Slurm.
articles.content: I discuss how to structure Slurm job scripts for dependency management, resource allocation, and parallel training on A100 GPUs. Examples include multi-node setups and integration with MLflow for experiment logging.
articles.author: Thomas Carr
